description: This Asian-inspired seared tuna salad is so simple and quick to make and zingy ponzu gives it great flavour.
name: Seared Tuna with Cucumber & Rice Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush the tuna steaks with half of the sesame oil and sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Set aside.
Cook the rice noodles according to pack instructions, drain and rinse under cold water.
Toss the noodles in a bowl with the cucumber ribbons, rice vinegar, a drizzle of sesame oil, chilli and coriander.
Heat a griddle pan on the highest setting and sear each tuna steak for 2030 seconds on each side. Rest for 5 minutes then serve with the noodle salad and ponzu sauce drizzled on top.
